text: chapter 1
it is london in 1872.
and this is mr phillius fogg's house
2nd of october 1872

mr phillius fogg is an english 
gentleman he lives in london

he hasn't got a wife or children but 
he has got a french servant passpartu
fog goes to his club every day
he eats at his club at 12 o'clock
in the afternoon he reads there
in the evening he eats there again

then he talks with his friends 
and at midnight he goes home
is happy he wants a quiet job

mr fogg's day eight o'clock gets 
up 8 23 breakfast 9 37 gets ready
11 30 goes to club midnight goes home

but one evening fox sees 
something interesting in the times

gentlemen thief takes 5 000 
pounds from the bank of england

at the club fox friends talk that gentleman thief 
can't go far says ralph with trains and ships

today's detectives move fast but 
thieves can move fast too flanigan says

today you can go round the world in 80 days 
says fog do it and i pay you 20 000 pounds

says stewart i'm leaving tonight answers fog 
perhaps i can't do it stuart but then i pay you 20

pounds the train for france leaves 
before nine in the evening fog
must be back in london by the 21st of december
fog gives 20 000 pounds in a bag to his servant

we're leaving for france he 
says pas partu isn't very happy
they go to france
then they take a train to italy
and a ship to port syed egypt
when their ship arrives in suez

an english detective mr fix is waiting 
he's looking for the gentleman thief

sue is october the 9th fogg 
visits the passport office

mr fix sees him there it's the gentleman 
thief he thinks i must tell london
chapter two
fix looks at past part two

where are you going he asks around the world says 
passpartu but right now i need some new shirts
fix takes him to a shop and leaves him there

then he sends a telegram to london the 
gentleman thief is going to bombay stop from fix

later he gets on the ship for 
bombay with fog and passpark too

it is the 20th of october they all 
arrive in bombay two days early

at 4 30 in the afternoon fog and passpark 2 leave 
the ship they want to get a train across india to

calcutta it leaves at eight o'clock first fog goes 
to the passport office then he eats at the station

visits the temple at malabar hill 
but he doesn't take off his shoes
visitors must remove their shoes

the priests get angry they take his 
shoes and passpark too runs away

fog and passpark 2 get on the train but fix stays 
in bombay he is waiting for a telegram from london
after three days the train stops
the railway from colby to a lullaby isn't ready

some men are building the railway 
but there are 80 kilometers
without a railway between colby and a lullaby

in colby passpartu gets some new shoes he also 
finds an elephant to take them to a lullaby
they stop near a temple in the village of pilagi
the old indian prince is dead

his young wife the princess must die with him 
in a big fire we must help that woman says fogg

the priests start the fire through 
the smoke fog sees something beautiful

the prince stands up and takes 
the princess out of the fire
the prince and the princess come nearer

fogg sees that the man is not the 
prince it is in the prince's clothes
quickly let's go says pass part two to fog quietly

suddenly the priests see the 
prince's body on the fire they see

that the man in the prince's clothes is 
not the prince and they become angry fogg

pas partu and the princess leave 
very quickly on the elephant
chapter three
at last they arrive in a lullaby

fog buy some european clothes for the 
princess what a beautiful woman he thinks
24th of october

on the train going to calcutta 
she speaks for the first time

my name's mrs auda thank you for helping me but 
i don't know what to do now i can never go home

we can take you to hong kong fog says thank 
you says mrs oda i have a cousin there
25th of october

at calcutta station a policeman stops them he 
takes them to see a judge mrs aouda goes to

fix is in calcutta detectives must move fast 
to find gentlemen thieves he's waiting in court

but fog and his friends don't see him why are we 
here for breaking the rules in a temple says the

judge in pilate asks folk no in bombay says the 
judge and he puts pas partus shoes on the table
you must go to prison for this

says the judge but fogg gives 2 000 
pounds to the court and they're free again

they get onto the ship for hong kong fix 
follows them but passpartout sees him perhaps

he's a detective he thinks perhaps he's working 
for mr stuart from the gentleman's club in london
the 6th of november

in hong kong mrs aouda learns that her cousin now 
lives in holland come with us to europe fogg says

passpartout wants to buy three tickets on 
the carnatic it leaves for yokohama in japan

the next morning but at the ticket office he 
learns that it's leaving early that evening

passpartout meets fix near the ticket 
office come for a drink says fix

fix tells passpartout i think you're mr fogg 
is a gentleman thief and i want to arrest him

passpartou doesn't want to help fix but 
the detective buys drink after drink
hospital goes to sleep on the table

now he can't tell fog about the carnatic 
thinks fix it leaves tonight but without fog
the 7th of november

next morning fogg and mrs aluda go to 
get on the carnatic but it isn't there

fix arrives the carnatics 
on its way to japan he says

and the next ship to yokohama leaves next week 
where's passpartout asks mrs alder i don't know

says fog but we must go on without 
him we must find another ship

fogg finds a small ship the tanker dare to go to 
shanghai there they can get a big ship to yokohama
can i go with you asks fix of course bog answers
the tanked air travels through storms
and at last arrives near shanghai

suddenly they see a big ship in front 
of them it's on its way to yokohama
signal to that ship says folk

the 13th of november passpartou arrives in 
yokohama but he has no money he leaves the

carnatic and finds work in mr batulka's circus 
mr batulka's circus living for america tomorrow
i can go to america with the circus he thinks
the 14th of november

fog mrs alder and fix get on the big ship 
and a week later they arrive in japan

the carnatic is in yokohama fog 
and mrs aouda go on to the carnatic

they find passpartu's name in the book of 
passengers names but they can't find passpartout

their ship leaves for san francisco in a few 
hours before they leave fogg goes to the circus
passpartout sees him there mr fogg he says happily

fogg wants to take passpar 2 with 
him but first he must pay mr batulka

at six o'clock in the evening fog past part 
two and mrs aouda go on to the american ship
fix follows them
chapter five

i'm sorry about hong kong says passpark 
too i don't usually drink much but

later haspar 2 sees fix on the ship my 
master isn't a gentleman thief he says listen

says fix i now have papers from london to 
arrest mr fogg but i can't stop him now
it must be in england when we get there
the 3rd of december

they arrive in san francisco in the morning 
the new york train leaves that evening
fogg and mrs aouda meet fix in the street

i am traveling to europe now can we travel 
together he asks of course answers fog
they walk into a meeting
shout the people on the left

shout the people on the right 
then they start fighting

one man wants to fight fog but fix 
stands in front of him and stops him

past part two finds it all very strange 
so mr fix is helping us now he thinks

fog mrs alder pass part 2 and 
fix get on the train that evening

they cross one old bridge very fast 
and it falls into the river behind them
then some sioux indians arrive
they kill some passengers passpartout fights them
but they take him and ride away with him
fog mrs aouda and fix get off the train

fogg goes to look for past part two 
he finds him and brings him back

but they must wait until evening 
until the next train to new york

how can we travel fast over the snow 
things fix on a sledge with sails

soon they arrive in omaha there 
they take a train to new york
the 11th of december

they arrive in new york 45 minutes late their 
ship the china is on its way to liverpool
chapter 6 the 12th of december

the next morning fogg mrs pas partu and fix leave 
on a small ship the henrietta going to france
later fogg gives the sailors money

and they agree to go to liverpool not to 
france the sailors lock the captain in his room
the 16th of december

the henrietta is in the middle of 
the atlantic and there's no coal
burn all the wood on the ship says fog
the 20th of december

the ship arrives in queenstown in the south 
of ireland and there's no more wood on it

let's get off here says fog 
to mrs ouda pas partu and fix

fix doesn't arrest fog in queenstown he's 
waiting for them to arrive in england
the 21st of december

they get on a train and travel to dublin 
there they get a fast ship to liverpool

in liverpool fix arrests fog 
at last and takes him to prison
in prison fogg looks at his diary

the 21st of december 11 40 
a.m we arrive in liverpool

at two o'clock he looks at his watch there's 
time to go to london on a fast train and to be

at my club by 8 45 this evening he thinks at 
half past three fix arrives with mrs aouda

i'm sorry mr fogg says fix the gentleman 
thief james strand is in prison

you're free to go angrily 
fog punches fix in the face

then fog mrs aouda and passpartu run to 
liverpool station they get a fast train to london

the train arrives at ten minutes to nine fogg 
is five minutes late for his meeting with stuart

fogg doesn't want to get to his club late so 
he goes home with mrs alder and passpartout

around the world in 80 days 
and five minutes he's the loser

he has only 20 000 pounds in the bank 
and he must give it all to stuart

i'm sorry for bringing you here to a poor man's 
home he says to mrs alder the next morning
will you marry me asks mrs ouda yes says fog

that afternoon fog tells passpartout i want to 
marry mrs aluda tomorrow the 23rd of december

can you speak to the people 
at malabone church about it

soon pass part 2 returns today is the 21st of 
december when you travel east around the world

you get an extra day you aren't late for your 
meeting at the club after all but you must run
the 21st december

at a quarter to nine folk enters his club i 
win he says to stewart where's my 20 000 pounds

next monday folk the world traveler 
marries mrs alder he's a very happy man
so
you
